data.eml:eml: A newly discovered biodiversity hotspot of many-plumed moths in the Mount Cameroon area: first report on species diversity, with description of nine new species (Lepidoptera, Alucitidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Ustjuzhanin, Peter, Kovtunovich, Vasily, Safian, Szabolcs, Maicher, Vincent, Tropek, Robert (2018): A newly discovered biodiversity hotspot of many-plumed moths in the Mount Cameroon area: first report on species diversity, with description of nine new species (Lepidoptera, Alucitidae). ZooKeys 777: 119-139, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.777.24729, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.777.24729
